DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect interval walk train versus continuous walk training patient chronic obstructive pulmonary disease . Patients recruit 3-week inpatient pulmonary rehabilitation program randomize one two intervention group . All walk training session perform treadmill . Walking intensity continuous walk group 60 percent average speed 6-minute walking test . Patients interval train group perform high intensity interval 120 % 6-minute walking test speed 60 second alternate 60 second rest . The total exercise duration progressively increase 10 32 minute .
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Versus Interval Walking Training Patients With COPD - Pilot Study
